name: Data Flow & Pipeline Sprites
description: Comprehensive sprite library for data pipelines, ETL processes, analytics, and data transformation visualization

sources.name: Data Sources
sources.description: Various data input sources and origins

file-source.name: File Data Source
file-source.description: File-based data source (CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)
file-source.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="100" rx="6" fill="#374151" stroke="#4b5563" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="64" height="84" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="15" y="20" width="50" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="30" width="40" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="40" width="45" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="50" width="35" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="60" width="50" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="70" width="30" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6b7280"/><text x="40" y="85" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#374151" font-weight="bold">FILE</text>

database-source.name: Database Source
database-source.description: Database as data source with query indicators
database-source.svg: <ellipse cx="50" cy="15" rx="35" ry="10" fill="#1e40af" stroke="#1d4ed8" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="15" y="15" width="70" height="60" fill="#1e40af" stroke="#1d4ed8" stroke-width="2"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="75" rx="35" ry="10" fill="#2563eb" stroke="#1d4ed8" stroke-width="2"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="30" rx="30" ry="6" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.7"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="45" rx="30" ry="6" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.7"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="60" rx="30" ry="6" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.7"/><text x="50" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">DB</text>

api-source.name: API Data Source
api-source.description: REST API or web service as data source
api-source.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="70" rx="8" fill="#059669" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="50" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="25" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="50" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="75" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981"/><path d="M25 35 Q50 20 75 35" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/><text x="50" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#047857" font-weight="bold">API</text>

stream-source.name: Stream Data Source
stream-source.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="6" fill="#7c2d12" stroke="#92400e" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="40" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M20 30 Q35 20 50 30 T80 30 T100 30" stroke="#ea580c" stroke-width="3" fill="none"/><circle cx="25" cy="30" r="2" fill="#ea580c"><animate attributeName="cx" values="25;95;25" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></circle><circle cx="40" cy="27" r="2" fill="#ea580c"><animate attributeName="cx" values="40;110;40" dur="2.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></circle><text x="60" y="45" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#92400e" font-weight="bold">STREAM</text>

transformations.name: Data Transformations
transformations.description: ETL processes, data cleaning, and transformation operations

etl-process.name: ETL Process
etl-process.description: Extract, Transform, Load process with three distinct phases
etl-process.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="80" rx="8" fill="#7c3aed" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="160" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="40" height="40" rx="4" fill="#3b82f6" stroke="#1d4ed8" stroke-width="1"/><text x="40" y="42" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">E</text><rect x="70" y="20" width="40" height="40" rx="4" fill="#f59e0b" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="1"/><text x="90" y="42" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">T</text><rect x="120" y="20" width="40" height="40" rx="4" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="1"/><text x="140" y="42" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">L</text><path d="M60 40 L70 40 M110 40 L120 40" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#etlArrow)"/><defs><marker id="etlArrow" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="8" refX="7" refY="3" orient="auto"><polygon points="0 0, 8 3, 0 6" fill="#6d28d9"/></marker></defs>

data-cleaner.name: Data Cleaner
data-cleaner.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="8" fill="#0891b2" stroke="#0e7490" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="50" cy="35" r="15" fill="#06b6d4" stroke="#0891b2" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M42 35 L48 41 L58 31" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="3" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/><rect x="20" y="55" width="60" height="3" rx="1" fill="#0891b2" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="25" y="60" width="50" height="3" rx="1" fill="#0891b2" opacity="0.5"/><text x="50" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#0e7490" font-weight="bold">CLEAN</text>

aggregator.name: Data Aggregator
aggregator.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="8" fill="#dc2626" stroke="#b91c1c" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M30 25 L50 15 L70 25 L70 45 L50 55 L30 45 Z" fill="#ef4444" stroke="#dc2626" stroke-width="2"/><text x="50" y="37" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">Î£</text><circle cx="25" cy="60" r="3" fill="#dc2626"/><circle cx="50" cy="60" r="3" fill="#dc2626"/><circle cx="75" cy="60" r="3" fill="#dc2626"/><text x="50" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#b91c1c" font-weight="bold">AGG</text>

destinations.name: Data Destinations
destinations.description: Data output destinations and storage targets

data-warehouse.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="100" rx="8" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="80" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="80" height="8" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><rect x="20" y="35" width="80" height="8" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><rect x="20" y="50" width="80" height="8" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><rect x="20" y="65" width="80" height="8" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><rect x="25" y="22" width="70" height="4" rx="1" fill="#9ca3af"/><rect x="25" y="37" width="70" height="4" rx="1" fill="#9ca3af"/><rect x="25" y="52" width="70" height="4" rx="1" fill="#9ca3af"/><rect x="25" y="67" width="70" height="4" rx="1" fill="#9ca3af"/><text x="60" y="85" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#374151" font-weight="bold">WAREHOUSE</text>

data-lake.name: Data Lake
data-lake.description: Raw data storage lake for unstructured data
data-lake.svg: <ellipse cx="60" cy="50" rx="50" ry="30" fill="#0369a1" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"/><ellipse cx="60" cy="45" rx="45" ry="25" fill="#0ea5e9" opacity="0.8"/><ellipse cx="60" cy="40" rx="40" ry="20" fill="#38bdf8" opacity="0.6"/><circle cx="30" cy="35" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8"/><circle cx="45" cy="30" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.6"/><circle cx="75" cy="32" r="2.5" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.7"/><circle cx="85" cy="38" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.5"/><text x="60" y="70" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#0284c7" font-weight="bold">DATA LAKE</text>

analytics-dashboard.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="140" height="100" rx="8" fill="#7c3aed" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="120" height="80" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.95"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="50" height="30" rx="2" fill="#a78bfa" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="80" y="20" width="40" height="30" rx="2" fill="#c4b5fd" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="20" y="60" width="100" height="20" rx="2" fill="#ddd6fe" opacity="0.3"/><path d="M25 45 L35 35 L45 40 L55 30 L65 35" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/><rect x="85" y="25" width="30" height="4" rx="2" fill="#8b5cf6"/><rect x="85" y="32" width="25" height="4" rx="2" fill="#8b5cf6"/><rect x="85" y="39" width="35" height="4" rx="2" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="30" cy="70" r="6" fill="#7c3aed"/><circle cx="50" cy="70" r="6" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="70" cy="70" r="6" fill="#a78bfa"/><circle cx="90" cy="70" r="6" fill="#c4b5fd"/><circle cx="110" cy="70" r="6" fill="#ddd6fe"/><text x="70" y="88" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#6d28d9" font-weight="bold">DASHBOARD</text>
